EmailTemplate.description: Initiate process for the first-time renewal of a no charge license
EmailTemplate.name: Renewal Process Kickoff - First Time
EmailTemplate.subject: No Charge Renewal Proposal Due [DUE DATE] - {!Contact.Account_Name_Latin__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
The no charge licenses for {!Contact.Account_Name_Latin__c} are set to expire on {!Partner_Agreement__c.Extended_End_Date__c}. This message is to initiate the renewal process, should you want to continue the no charge relationship for another year. Please save a copy of the linked template and send it to me by [DUE DATE].
Thank you,
-Justin
Tools Current License Configuration Spreadsheet Activation Data Spreadsheet Previously Approved Proposal
